    Package Description
    com.rapidminer.belt.table  

    • Uses of ColumnSelector in com.rapidminer.belt.table

      Methods in com.rapidminer.belt.table that return ColumnSelector 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ColumnSelector ColumnSelector.matchesPredicate​(java.util.function.BiPredicate<Column,​java.lang.String> predicate)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must match the given predicate.
      ColumnSelector ColumnSelector.notOfCategory​(Column.Category category)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must not have the given category.
      ColumnSelector ColumnSelector.notOfTypeId​(Column.TypeId typeId)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must not have the given type id.
      ColumnSelector ColumnSelector.ofCategory​(Column.Category category)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must have the given category.
      ColumnSelector ColumnSelector.ofTypeId​(Column.TypeId typeId)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must have the given type id.
      ColumnSelector Table.select()
      Creates a ColumnSelector for this table as a starting point for different column selection methods.
      ColumnSelector ColumnSelector.withCapability​(Column.Capability capability)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must have the given capability.
      ColumnSelector ColumnSelector.withMetaData​(ColumnMetaData metaData)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must have the given meta data.
      <T extends ColumnMetaData>
      ColumnSelector      		 ColumnSelector.withMetaData​(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must have the given meta data type.

      Adds the requirement to the selector that all selected columns must not have the given capability.
